  • Uses of Action in game.actions

    Subclasses of Action in game.actions
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AttackAction
    - An action that allows an actor to attack another actor in a specified direction.
    class 
    BuyAction
    Represents an action that allows an Actor to buy a Buyable item from a Merchant.
    class 
    CureAction
    An action that allows an actor to cure a Curable target at a specified location.
    class 
    EatAction
    An action allowing an actor to eat an Edible item.
    class 
    GrowAction
    Triggers growth.
    class 
    ListenAction
    An action that allows an Actor to listen to a monologue from an NPC.
    class 
    PlantAction
    An action that allows an actor to plant a Seed at a specified location.
    class 
    ScammedAction
    Represents an action that allows an Actor to get scammed by Merchant.
    class 
    TalkAction
    An Action that allows an Actor (usually the player) to select a dialogue option when interacting with a DialogueCapable NPC.
    class 
    TeleportAction
    An action that teleports an actor to a specified location on a specified map.
